sentences.english: The last was opened in Dalian in Liaoning province in February this year.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一家去年二月在辽宁大连开张。

sentences.english: I use them September through December.
sentences.chinese: 从九月到十二月，都可以用木珠来装饰房间。

sentences.english: February was definitely not a good month for the automobile industry in America.
sentences.chinese: 二月份铁定是美国汽车工业销售惨淡的一个月。

sentences.english: Kelley, a critically acclaimed singer-songwriter, is due to release a new album in February.
sentences.chinese: 作为创作型歌手的凯利将在明年二月发行新唱片。

sentences.english: The fire broke out on the morning of Dec. 23, 1991.
sentences.chinese: 这次火灾发生于1991年十二月二十三日的早晨。

sentences.english: There was hope that the war could end by Christmas, December twenty-fifth.
sentences.chinese: 战争有望在十二月25号，即圣诞节之前结束。

sentences.english: Sometimes it is also cold in February and March.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的天气非常的冷，在十二月和一月。

sentences.english: The gathering will be next February in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 该会议将在明年二月份在罗马举行。

sentences.english: Sixty thousand Prussians invaded Denmark in February.
sentences.chinese: 六万普鲁士人于二月入侵了丹麦。

sentences.english: Judging by the signs, could be late November, early December.
sentences.chinese: 从现象来看，可能是十一月底，十二月初了吧。

sentences.english: In December, we must wear heavy clothes when go out since it is clod at that time.
sentences.chinese: 十二月天寒地冻，所以我们穿上厚重的衣服外出。

sentences.english: Our school-wide academic contest will be held this Saturday, 12/11/04.
sentences.chinese: 本学期学艺竞赛将于本周六，十二月十一日举行。

sentences.english: We shall feel greatly obliged if you will remit us a cheque for the goods supplied you in December last.
sentences.chinese: 去年十二月送上货物一批，请汇寄支票付款，甚谢。

sentences.english: February brings the rain , thaws the frozen ponds again .
sentences.chinese: 二月带来雨水，使池塘水面冰层融解。

sentences.english: The 28th of February, 1815, at half-past two in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 一八一五年二月二十八日，下午两点半钟。

sentences.english: February 14 is Chinese New Year and it is also Saint Valentine's Day. We will have a baptism service on that day.
sentences.chinese: 二月十四日中国新年又是圣瓦伦丁日，我们有洗礼。

definition: first month of the lunar year
